## Curso: <span id="courseName">Engenharia de Pesca</span>
### Período: 4º – Ano letivo 2025/2025

<iframe id="calendarFrame"
        src="resources/calendarios/EP_T2025_4P-2025.html">
</iframe>

</section>
</div>

<!-- ====== SCRIPT ========= -->
<script>
const courses = {
  EP: { name: "Engenharia de Pesca", prefix: "EP_T", turmas: ["2022","2023","2024","2025"], defaultTurma: "2025" },
  CB: { name: "Ciências Biológicas", prefix: "CB_T", turmas: ["2022","2023","2024","2025"], defaultTurma: "2025" },
  CN: { name: "Ciências Naturais",  prefix: "CN_T", turmas: ["2022","2023","2024","2025"], defaultTurma: "2025" }
};

// gera links de turma
function loadTurmas(courseKey){
  const box = document.getElementById('turmaList');
  box.innerHTML = '';
  courses[courseKey].turmas.forEach(yr => {
    const a = document.createElement('a');
    a.href = '#';
    a.textContent = yr;
    a.onclick = e => { e.preventDefault(); showCalendar(courseKey, yr); };
    box.appendChild(a);
  });
}

// troca de curso
function changeCourse(courseKey){
  const c = courses[courseKey];
  document.getElementById('courseName').textContent = c.name;
  loadTurmas(courseKey);
  showCalendar(courseKey, c.defaultTurma);
  document.getElementById('courseSelect').value = courseKey;
}

// exibe calendário
function showCalendar(courseKey, turma){
  const c = courses[courseKey];
  const src = `resources/calendarios/${c.prefix}${turma}_4P-2025.html`;
  document.getElementById('calendarFrame').src = src;

  // destaque visual
  Array.from(document.getElementById('turmaList').children)
       .forEach(a => a.classList.toggle('active', a.textContent === turma));
}

// inicialização
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => changeCourse('EP'));
</script>
